definition: family livelihood/a household's economic situation/family property

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
PRC State Planning Committee, abbr. for 國家計劃委員會|国家计划委员会[Guo2 jia1 Ji4 hua4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]

PRC State Planning Committee, set up in 1952, replaced in 1998 by State Development and Planning Committee 國家發展計劃委員會|国家发展计划委员会[Guo2 jia1 Fa1 zhan3 Ji4 hua4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4] then in 2003 by National Development and Reform Commission 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会[Guo2 jia1 Fa1 zhan3 he2 Gai3 ge2 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Ji4 hua4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: I was about to become the breadwinner for my family and I was 18 years old.
sentences.chinese: 18岁的我将要成为负担家计的男人。

sentences.english: Comrade Huang Xiaohui is researcher of institute of technology of economy of state committee of planning.
sentences.chinese: 黄小蕙同志是国家计委经济技术研究所研究员。

sentences.english: Article 25 These Measures shall be interpreted by the State Planning Commission (SPC).
sentences.chinese: 第二十五条本办法由国家计委负责解释。

sentences.english: Policemen with families have to moonlight to make ends meet.
sentences.chinese: 有家室的警察必须兼差才能维持家计。

sentences.english: Eg: A transnational program for improving the economy of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 改善欧洲经济的一项超国家计划。

sentences.english: Households having children between the ages of 7 to 12 ate more ham.
sentences.chinese: 有7至12岁学龄儿童的家计单位消费较多后腿肉。

sentences.english: With five children in college, Steve still manages to make both ends meet.
sentences.chinese: 有五个小孩在念大学，史蒂夫还是有办法维持家计。

sentences.english: He toiled every day to support his family.
sentences.chinese: 他每天为家计辛苦工作。

sentences.english: The SPDC is responsible for projects with investment surpassing the set ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 其中限额以上的项目由国家计委负责。

sentences.english: My father gained a bare livelihood of family by his own hands.
sentences.chinese: 父亲靠自己的双手勉强维持家计。

sentences.english: His father was a sickly man and his mother washed clothing for a living.
sentences.chinese: 他的父亲体弱多病，而母亲则靠洗衣服维持家计。

sentences.english: The life and experiences, versatility and garden creating achievements of JI Cheng, an ancient Chinese garden creator, are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了中国古代造园家计成的生平和造园成就。

definition: to scrape a meager living/to get by with difficulty
to support a family/to raise a family
to come down in the world (idiom)/to suffer a reversal of fortune
to pass one's days/to scratch out a difficult, meager existence
to look after (elderly parents)/to serve/to support
to be orphaned of one's father
